mapper.select:
SELECT B.FREEBOARD_NO, M.UNO, B.TITLE, B.SUB_TITLE, B.HASH_TAG, B.CONTENT, B.IMG_ORIGINAL, B.IMG_RENAMED, B.POST_DATE, B.STATUS, B.COUNT, B.BOARD_TYPE FROM COMM_JOURNEY B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMM_JOURNEY B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writerKeyword}||'%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{titleKeyword}||'%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{contentKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY B.NO DESC

SELECT B.JOURNEY_NO, B.TITLE, M.UNO, B.SUB_TITLE, B.HASH_TAG, B.CONTENT, B.IMG_ORIGINAL, B.IMG_RENAMED, B.POST_DATE, B.STATUS, B.COUNT, B.BOARD_TYPE, R.COMMENT_NO AS R_COMMENT_NO, R.JOURNEY_NO AS R_FREEBOARD_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.UNO AS R_UNO, R.POST_DATE AS R_POST_DATE, R.STATUS AS R_STATUS, FROM COMM_JOURNEY B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.UNO = M.UNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN JOURNEY_COMMENT R ON(B.JOURNEY_NO = R.JOURNEY_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.UNO = M2.UNO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.JOURNEY_NO=#{journeyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM_JOURNEY ( JOURNEY_NO, UNO, TITLE, SUB_TITLE, HASH_TAG, CONTENT, IMG_ORIGINAL, IMG_RENAMED, POST_DATE, STATUS, COUNT, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_JOURNEY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{uNo}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{hashTag}, #{content}, #{imgOriginal}, #{imgRenamed}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, 1, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO JOURNEY_COMMENT VALUES(SEQ_JOURNEY_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{journeyNo}, #{uNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.update:
UPDATE COMM_JOURNEY SET TITLE=#{title}, SUB_TITLE=#{subTitle}, HASH_TAG=#{hashTag}, CONTENT=#{content},
IMG_ORIGINAL=#{imgOriginal},
IMG_RENAMED=#{imgRenamed},
WHERE COMM_JOURNEY=#{journeyNo}
UPDATE COMM_JOURNEY SET COUNT=#{count} WHERE JOURNEY_NO=#{journeyNo}
UPDATE COMM_JOURNEY SET STATUS='N' WHERE JOURNEY_NO=#{journeyNo}
